scenario: You see a woman spray painting graffiti across the steps of the local courthouse.
vulnerable_expl: because the courthouse is a symbol of justice and the graffiti can undermine public trust in the legal system
intentional_expl: because spray painting graffiti requires deliberate action and planning
harm_expl: because defacing public property is considered a crime and can lead to financial costs for restoration
help_expl: because the graffiti does not provide any immediate help or benefit to anyone
moral_expl: because defacing public property is generally considered immoral and disrespectful

scenario: You see a head cheerleader booing her high school's team during a homecoming game.
vulnerable_expl: because the high school's team may feel discouraged or demoralized by the booing, but they are not in immediate danger or harm.
intentional_expl: because the head cheerleader intentionally chose to boo the team during the game.

scenario: You have a small horse stud in Australia. You are heading towards the nearby town in a four-wheel drive together with a new client when you notice a bolting wild horse which is galloping like mad. It is heading towards three people who are walking near the edge of a gorge and soon it will run into them. You immediately follow and are able to catch up with it. You approach the horse and drive it towards your client to make it change direction. You know that the client will be trampled by the horse and will be killed, but the other three people will be saved.
vulnerable_expl: because the three people are in immediate danger of being trampled by the horse
intentional_expl: because you intentionally drive the horse towards your client to save the three people
harm_expl: because your client will be trampled and killed by the horse
help_expl: because you successfully save the three people from being trampled
moral_expl: because while your action saves three lives, it results in the death of your client
assumption_for_agent: You are a horse stud owner in Australia
assumption_for_patient: The wild horse is running towards three people

vulnerable_expl: because stealing money from someone's wallet is a violation of trust, but the dad is not extremely vulnerable
intentional_expl: because stealing money intentionally requires planning and thought
harm_expl: because stealing money is harmful and can cause financial loss
help_expl: because buying ice cream for friends can be seen as a kind gesture, but it was done with stolen money
moral_expl: because stealing money is generally considered immoral
assumption_for_agent: I assumed that the agent is a child in third grade
assumption_for_patient: I assumed that my dad is the parent of the agent

moral_expl: because the action of selling the house to fund a local program for the needy is generally considered a morally commendable act.

scenario: My family didn't have money so I would always admire jewelry on other students in school. In second grade there was this little girl who would wear this necklace. One time at recess she put it down and I took it.
vulnerable_expl: because the child is not aware of the theft and may not have the means to protect themselves.
intentional_expl: because I intentionally took the necklace when the girl put it down.
harm_expl: because although the action caused harm by taking the necklace, it did not cause any physical or emotional harm to the girl.
help_expl: because the action did not provide any help to anyone.
moral_expl: because the action of stealing someone's necklace is considered immoral.
assumption_for_agent: I assumed that the agent is a child who is envious of other students' jewelry.
patient: The little girl who wore the necklace
assumption_for_patient: I assumed that the patient is a child who is unaware of the theft.

intentional_expl: because we intentionally filled out the questionnaire to win
